channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. and Ukraine sign landmark minerals deal after months of fraught negotiations
item.description: The minerals deal, long coveted by U.S. President Donald Trump, comes more than three years since the start of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine...

item.title: Trump national security advisor Mike Waltz expected to leave post after Signal scandal

item.title: U.S. Chamber of Commerce asks Trump for tariff exclusions to 'stave off a recession'
item.description: President Donald Trump has held up tariffs as a key tool in trade negotiations, but some analysts warn the duties are hurting business and the overall...

item.title: Tariff relief offered to car companies by Trump fails to address 2 top concerns
‘Sell America’ fears are evolving into a ‘buy less’ posture in the bond market
You’re seeing a stock-market rebound that nobody wanted: Nomura strategist
American manufacturing is slumping again. U.S. trade policy is a factor.
Lars Klingbeil to become Germany's vice chancellor and finance minister, Social Democratic Party says
item.description: The Social Democratic Party's Lars Klingbeil has been tapped to become Germany's next finance minister in the incoming centrist coalition government.

item.title: White House moving 'as fast as possible' on India trade deal, Navarro says

item.title: Tens of millions in Europe lost power this week. No one seems to know why.
